recommendations: Hitch Kick is a jump in which the skater kicks the back leg forward, then lands on the front foot.. For practicing Hitch Kick as a/an amateur performance, the recommended warm-up exercises are Leg swings, High knees, Basic hop for 10 repetitions for 20 minutes. After warming up, you should practice the following instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart., Kick leading leg forward., Hop on supporting leg., Kick trailing leg forward., Land on trailing leg, leading leg in front. for 10 repetitions for 20 minutes. Since you want to particularly focus on coordination, additional exercises could include Pirouette with arms, Spotting practice, Quick footwork patterns.

Chaine Leaps is a series of jumps in which the skater alternates between the front and back legs.. For practicing Chaine Leaps as a/an advanced performance, the recommended warm-up exercises are Grand jeté, Chaine turn to sauté arabesque, Chaine turn to sauté attitude for 10 repetitions for 20 minutes. After warming up, you should practice the following instructions: Start in B-plus position., Perform a chaine turn, swinging arms with precision., Push off the back leg, leaping with high straight legs., Land on the front leg, bending knees., Flow seamlessly into the next chaine leap. for 10 repetitions for 20 minutes. Since you want to particularly focus on coordination, additional exercises could include Pirouette with arms, Spotting practice, Quick footwork patterns.

Axel Turn is a jump in which the skater rotates 360 degrees in the air, landing on the back foot.. For practicing Axel Turn as a/an amateur performance, the recommended warm-up exercises are Jumping jacks, Single-leg hops, Tuck jumps for 10 repetitions for 20 minutes. After warming up, you should practice the following instructions: Start in B-plus position., Swing arms forward and jump off back foot., Rotate 360 degrees with legs crossed., Land on the back foot., Practice with a half turn first. for 10 repetitions for 20 minutes. Since you want to particularly focus on coordination, additional exercises could include Pirouette with arms, Spotting practice, Quick footwork patterns.
